welcome_message_body: Welcome to Excelsior Springs, a charming city known for its natural beauty and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Downtown Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.
